FILE: cm368370v11.0.txt
DYAD: LITHUANIA - BELARUS/BYELORUSSIA
RIVALRY: RIV1025
DISPUTE(S): MID4240 

PS-NOTES:

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180912
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180912

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID4240 

TERRMID: MID4240 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID4240 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID4240 from cm narrative, Belarus, upset by NATO's actions in Eastern Europe, started its largest military exercise in the previous 10 years. These exercises were targeted at Lithuania. Coded not territory because this was not connected to a territorial dispute. 

TERRLINK: MID4240 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID4240 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID4240 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID4240 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID4240 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID4240 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID4240 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID4240 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID4240 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID4240 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID4240 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID4240 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID4240 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID4240 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3 1993-2001:

MID4240
rivalry=368370 nationa=BELARUS nationb=LITHUANIA MID4240 20010830-20010900 
 revtype1a=POLICY revtype2a=NOT APPLICABLE fatala=NONE fatalpa=0 lhosta=DISPLAY OF FORCE 
 revtype1b=NOT APPLICABLE revtype2b=NOT APPLICABLE fatalb=NONE fatalpb=0
lhostb=NO MILITARIZED ACTION 

Belarus, upset by NATO's actions in Eastern Europe, has started its largest military exercise in the last 10 years. These exercises were targeted at Lithuania. First day of dispute was on 8/30/2001 and last day of dispute was on 9/00/2001.
